about_the_game:
The DLC is a free add-on for the base game.

About this add-on
This add-on is a collection of wallpapers from the base game.

How to appreciate
To see wallpaper collections, open the Wallpaper folder in the local folder.
If you don't want this DLC, clear the DLC checkbox in the Steam app.
detailed_description:
The DLC is a free add-on for the base game.

About this add-on
This add-on is a collection of wallpapers from the base game.

How to appreciate
To see wallpaper collections, open the Wallpaper folder in the local folder.
If you don't want this DLC, clear the DLC checkbox in the Steam app.

name: Treasure of Cutuma 3rd - Ruler of the blue sky

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 MB available space

short_description: The DLC is a free add-on for the base game. This add-on is a collection of wallpapers from the base game.
